name: LE Holiday Collaboration Collection
description: A special 3 polish collection by Lacquer Lust, Polished by KPT and Serum No. 5 highlighting what we do best: holographic, thermals and glow in the dark! Ho Ho Holadays , a beautiful green holographic filled with gold/red shimmer. Naughty & Nice, is a red berry/wine color thermal polish when cold and transition to a rose pink when warm. It's loaded with gold & red sparkle and fine blue opalescent micro glitter. Thermal Tip: Extended exposure of thermal polishes to heat or places of high temperature will decrease the shelf-life and integrity of the thermal polishes. We recommend all thermal polishes be stored in cool temperature to obtain the optimal characteristics of these products. We are not responsible for the integrity of the thermal polishes as an effect of your local temperature and your storage method of the thermal polishes after purchase. Yule Light Up My Life, in a clear base jammed packed with 30 various glitter shapes, sizes, and colors. It's a fantastic glitter topper that glow white in the dark. Glow Tip: To get the best glow effect, paint over a white or other light colored base and activate the glow pigments by charging with a bright light source (ie. sun). This trio can also be purchased through Lacquer Lust and Serum No. 5 . swatches lacquerloon heartnat24

name: Dark Angels
description: A black base scattered holographic and red holo at different angle crelly polish. Best use with 2-3 coats and top with a quality topcoat. swatches lacquerloon heartnat24

name: Liquid Gold
description: If you love the texture and finished of gold leaf/foil leaf then this polish is for you. Liquid Gold is rich silver gold foil is filled with darker gold flecks resembling gold leaf. This polish dries giving you the gold foil shimmer finished with no topcoat needed. Best use in 2-3 coats to reach opacity. swatches lacquerloon heartnat24

name: Christmas Trees
description:
Decorate your nails with these fashionable and easy to use gold plated Christmas trees metal decal for the holiday. You can also use them to decorate your home, cell phone's case, glasses, made card, scrap booking, body art, or any DIY projects. Easy to apply on natural or artificial nails.

Application: 
- Paint nails in your desired color 
- Allow to dry thoroughly 
- Coat with good quality topcoat 
(you can also use superglue or The Best Glue Ever) 
- Apply each one separately
- Siutable for acrylic and gel nails

name: Elegant Color Rhinestones Nail Shields
description: Decorate your nails with these fashionable and easy to use elegant nail shields with purple, yellow, & red stones. You can also use them to decorate your home, cell phone's case, glasses, made card, scrap booking, body art, or any DIY projects. Easy to apply on natural or artificial nails. Application: - Paint nails in your desired color - Allow to dry thoroughly - Coat with good quality topcoat (you can also use superglue or The Best Glue Ever) - Apply each one separately Quantity: 2 pieces Style: gold plated Size: 1.5x1.1cm Wear: reusable charm Suitable to use on acrylic or gel nails Swatch by Myself and heartnat24

name: Blood as Thick as Gold
description: From the fall 2013 collection, this thermal polish transition in cold environment to a beautiful darken red and in warm it is a peachy nude filled with gold glass flecks with the additional micro gold shimmer. Application: 2-3 coats plus topcoat and we do not recommend wearing a base color with this polish. *Disclaimer: Extended exposure of thermal polishes to heat or places of high temperature will decrease the shelf-life and integrity of the thermal polishes. We recommend all thermal polishes be stored in cool temperature to obtain the optimal characteristics of these products. We are not responsible for the integrity of the thermal polishes as an effect of your local temperature and your storage method of the thermal polishes after purchase. swatches by makeupwithdrawal bedizzle workplaypolish lacquerloon

name: Nightcrawler
description: This is a rare duo-chrome thermal. The inspiration for this polish is from NightCrawler from X-Men because of his purple-blue skin color. His character also fits in perfectly with Halloween and the story! Application: recommended 2-3 coats plus topcoat and no base color needed. *Disclaimer: Extended exposure of thermal polishes to heat or places of high temperature will decrease the shelf-life and integrity of the thermal polishes. description: This limited edition thermal polish is inspired by October birthstones tourmaline and opal. When cold it is a vibrant rich pink; and when warm it is clear with the addition of purple and blue iridescent glitters resembling opal. Life in Pink or La Vie En Rose signifies happiness and optimism in life. *Disclaimer: Extended exposure of thermal polishes to heat or places of high temperature will decrease the shelf-life and integrity of the thermal polishes. It is filled with micro holographic and matte pink, green, and teal glitters in various shapes and sizes. name: Siren's Song
description: An exclusive thermal polish for shop Rainbow Connection in the U.K. The inspiration to this polish came from the beautiful mysterious mermaids. It is called Siren's Song because in Greek mythology, the Sirens were three dangerous mermaid like creatures, portrayed as seductresses who lured nearby sailors with their enchanting music and voices to shipwreck on the rocky coast of their island. This holographic teal thermal polish when cold transition to a transparent holographic filled with matte blue, purple, and green glitters. Application: 2-3 coats plus topcoat and no under color needed *Disclaimer: Extended exposure of thermal polishes to heat or places of high temperature will decrease the shelf-life and integrity of the thermal polishes. We recommend all thermal polishes be stored in cool temperature to obtain the optimal characteristics of these products. We are not responsible for the integrity of the thermal polishes as an effect of your local temperature and your storage method of the thermal polishes after purchase. swatches by lacquerloon makeupwithdrawal workplaypolish imhellablunt

description: The central figure to the collection is La Catrina (or La Calavera Catrina). I like the contrast of features in the makeup of La Catrina, which constitutes elegance and sophistication, yet dark, mysterious, and imperfect. This thermal polish transition in cold environment to a shimmery fern green and when warm it is a purplish taupe color (inspiration from here). Application: recommended 2-3 coats plus topcoat with no base color needed. *Disclaimer: Extended exposure of thermal polishes to heat or places of high temperature will decrease the shelf-life and integrity of the thermal polishes. We recommend all thermal polishes be stored in cool temperature to obtain the optimal characteristics of these products. We are not responsible for the integrity of the thermal polishes as an effect of your local temperature and your storage method of the thermal polishes after purchase. swatches by makeupwithdrawal bedizzle workplaypolish lacquerloon

name: Country Road
description: From the fall 2013 collection, this thermal polish transition in cold environment is a deep brown and in warm it is a mixture of yellow, gold, and red micro fleck colors. A unique aspect to this polish is the additional dark speck resembling the dirt road with a semi-texture finish. Application: recommended 2-3 coats plus topcoat and no base color needed. *Disclaimer: Extended exposure of thermal polishes to heat or places of high temperature will decrease the shelf-life and integrity of the thermal polishes. We are not responsible for the integrity of the thermal polishes as an effect of your local temperature and your storage method of the thermal polishes after purchase. swatches by makeupwithdrawal bedizzle workplaypolish lacquerloon

name: Starry Night
description: From the fall 2013 collection, this navy blue jelly polish is filled with holographic stars, moons, sliver hex, matte purple and black glitters. This polish is a replica of Van Gogh's Starry Night painting. To give this polish a dreamy effect, micro glass flecks are added to create shimmer and sparkles. Application: three coats plus topcoat swatches by lacquerloon makeupwithdrawal bedizzle workplaypolish

name: Corrupted Soul
description: From the fall 2013 collection, this glitter topper is jammed packed with various colors and shapes of holographic glitter. Application: first coat dab and apply a second coat swatches by makeupwithdrawal bedizzle workplaypolish lacquerloon valesha

name: Gloomy October
description: From the fall 2013 collection, this off white crelly polish is a replica of a gloomy day int he fall. It is filled with various shapes and sizes of red, blue, purple, and brown glitters. Application: recommended three coat plus topcoat swatches by makeupwithdrawal bedizzle workplaypolish lacquerloon madamluck

name: The Unrequited Love
description: Love does not always have a fairy tale ending. Many times love ends in tearful memories, loneliness, and lost souls that know not of where to go forward. And just when you have moved on, a song, a sight, or a sound and those nostalgic memories come rushing back to remind you love is not always easy, but so is loneliness. The Unrequited duo set expresses this theme with all purple thermal nail polishes featuring a deep violet to a fair lilac flakes in a black base called Ophelias Love and Nostalgia a duo-chrome with satin finish that shifts to a plum (at different angle you can spot green & grey) color to a subtle opal pink-purple. Ophelias Love represents a delicate, yet passionate soul, while Nostalgia conveys sadness and unwanted memories. Both Ophelias Love and Nostalgia undergo a dramatic transformation from a dark purple color to a light pink purple with a hint of green hue signify there is always a rosier side to life. *Disclaimer: Extended exposure of thermal polishes to heat or places of high temperature will decrease the shelf-life and integrity of the thermal polishes. We recommend all thermal polishes be stored in cool temperature to obtain the optimal characteristics of these products. We are not responsible for the integrity of the thermal polishes as an effect of your local temperature and your storage method of the thermal polishes after purchase. Released date: May 18th, 2013 swatches by lacquerloon fashionpolish

name: The Smardy Duo
description: I introduced you all to Nate, who is suffering from a rare Spinal Muscular Atrophy with Respiratory Distress Type 1 (SMARD1). SMARD1 is a neuromuscular disease that leads to the progressive deterioration of motor function. Unfortunately, at the current moment, the disease is incurable and its biology is not completely deciphered. Inspired by Nate and his story, I am excited to release two nail polishes in his honor: Glowing Smardy and Bleu Cruiser. More importantly, 50% of sales from these two nail polishes will be donated to DCipher Group Foundation Nate Green. Glowing Smardy (glow in the dark and filled with different shades of blue and glitter shapes and sizes) is a polish that absorbs regular light from a standard household light bulb and glows in the dark. It also glows under black or UV light. Glowing Smardy represents hope in a dark place. While Bleu Cruiser (fluorescent royal blue with micro glass flakes which also glow under UV and black light) represents Nates courageous spirit as he cruises in his battle against SMARD. Of all the nail polishes I have created, I am especially proud of these two polishes because they carry with them a special purpose. Perhaps, you might wonder if its such a rare disease, then how did I find out about SMARDY? Nates aunt is my co-worker and told me about the condition. I hope you will join me in sending your love to Nate. I have received so much love and support from all of you and this is my way of paying it forward to a strong-will soul like Nate. Swatches by makeupwithdrawal madamluck

name: Color Therapy
description: A fun bold neon pink and green glitter with tiny shifting opalescent and blue glitter topper in a clear base that also glow under UV and black light. This glitter topcoat goes great over any base color. Application: 1-2 coats over color base swatches by makeupwithdrawal lacquerloon madamluck workplaypolish

name: Bachelorette Party
description: A beautiful shimmery purple/lilac glitter polish with matte white hex and iridescent glitter with a silvery micro glass finish. Application: 2 coats over a color base swatches by lacquerloon makeupwithdrawal madamluck workplaypolish

name: High Maintenance
description: A mixture of girly matte pastel colors and iridescent glitters in a clear base. Application: 1-2 coats over a color base swatches by lacquerloon makeupwithdrawal

name: Hot Like Wasabi
description: A spectacular temperature nail polish that changes from a holographic olive green jelly to light grayish green. This topcoat polish can be layer over any color base. The holo wasabi green thermatic polish changes color depending on the temperature. If you have warm hands it will be grayish green, and on cold hands they are sparkling olive green. *Disclaimer: Extended exposure of thermal polishes to heat or places of high temperature will decrease the shelf-life and integrity of the thermal polishes. We recommend all thermal polishes be stored in cool temperature to obtain the optimal characteristics of these products. We are not responsible for the integrity of the thermal polishes as an effect of your local temperature and your storage method of the thermal polishes after purchase. Released date: March 23rd, 2013 swatches by jackie18g lacquerloon peachypolish heartnat24

name: Holographic Topcoat
description: SpectraFlair grade 25 and 35 top coat mixture that can be layered over any color to give it a stunning rainbow holographic effect. SF top coat comes in a standard full size 15 ml bottle and two stainless steel balls. swatches by jackie18g

name: Blue is Beautiful
description: This gorgeous navy blue thermal with shifting blue/purple glitters polish changes from a navy blue shimmering color in normal state (cold environment) and in warm temperature it's transition to a lighter sparkling sky blue. Since this is a fading thermal polish, you can use any desire base color to create a differrent look. For example, this blue thermal polish is applied to a white surface, the surface turns from blue to white at the change-over temperature. Similarly, if the polish is applied to something pink the surface color changes from black to pink in warm temperature. When the temperature falls (cold), the polish coloring re-appears to blue. This fun playful polish can be worn alone (opaque in 2-3 thin coats), or jazz it up with other contrasting polish colors. *Note polish was reformulated to a more brighter navy blue. *Disclaimer: Extended exposure of thermal polishes to heat or places of high temperature will decrease the shelf-life and integrity of the thermal polishes. We recommend all thermal polishes be stored in cool temperature to obtain the optimal characteristics of these products. We are not responsible for the integrity of the thermal polishes as an effect of your local temperature and your storage method of the thermal polishes after purchase. swatches by makeupwithdrawal jackie18g madamluck lacquerloon

name: Green Awakening
description: A concentrated shifting gold to green pigment glitter with the added blue sparkle topper can be use over any base color polish. This pigment is similar to Fantasy Fire so it's ultra fine giving the transitioning effect of gold, yellow, orange, and green when expose to indirect light. Works best when layered over a black or dark color polish. Released date: March 23rd, 2013 swatches makeupwithdrawal jackie18g lacquerloon chalkboardnails

name: Camellia
description:
A spectacular temperature nail polish that changes from a vibrant reddish pink  cream like jelly to clear. This topcoat polish can be layer over any color base. The reddish pink to clear thermatic polish changes color depending on the temperature. If you have warm hands it will be clear, and on cold hands they are reddish bright pink.  

*Disclaimer: Extended exposure of thermal polishes to heat or places of high temperature will decrease the shelf-life and integrity of the thermal polishes. We recommend all thermal polishes be stored in cool temperature to obtain the optimal characteristics of these products. We are not responsible for the integrity of the thermal polishes as an effect of your local temperature and your storage method of the thermal polishes after purchase.



Released date: March 23rd, 2013
*Swatches credit to <span style="color:#ad2ef2"> lacquerloon and valesha on Instagram.


ATTENTION: The temperature in the summer is higher than usual which will most likely cause the thermal polish to change to their warm state during shipment. Please do not be alarm because of the color change which is supposed to be altered by temperature. For best use, it is recommended you polish under room temperature or cool environment.

name: Plumeria
description: A spectacular temperature nail polish that changes from a scattered holographic plum pink crelly to a shimmer sliver. This topcoat polish can be layer over any color base. The holo plum pink to clear thermatic polish changes color depending on the temperature. If you have warm hands it will be clear, and on cold hands they are plum pink. *This polish was reformulated with more Spectraflair. The pink transition is more of a plumy pink. Disclaimer: Extended exposure of thermal polishes to heat or places of high temperature will decrease the shelf-life and integrity of the thermal polishes. We recommend all thermal polishes be stored in cool temperature to obtain the optimal characteristics of these products. Disclaimer: Extended exposure of thermal polishes to heat or places of high temperature will decrease the shelf-life and integrity of the thermal polishes. description: A spectacular temperature nail polish that changes from a vibrant purple cream like jelly to pink. This topcoat polish is best layer over a white polish to reach opacity, vibrancy, and transition effect. The purple to pink thermatic polish changes color depending on the temperature of your hands. If you have warm hands it will be pink, and on cold hands they are purple. *Disclaimer: Extended exposure of thermal polishes to heat or places of high temperature will decrease the shelf-life and integrity of the thermal polishes. We recommend all thermal polishes be stored in cool temperature to obtain the optimal characteristics of these products. We are not responsible for the integrity of the thermal polishes as an effect of your local temperature and your storage method of the thermal polishes after purchase. *Note: the holographic version is reformulated with more Spectraflair so the color is more rich. swatches by Photo 3: non-holographic version lacquerloon Photo 4 & 5: holographic version jackie18g

name: Dream Lover
description: "To dream a dream is to awaken your inner self. Your wants, your desires, your passions are given life." Source Unknown Dream Lover is a lovely white milky base jammed packed with holographic turquoise, pink, irresdescence glitters in various shapes. This dreamy polish contain pastel colors stars and hearts mix. In addition, it has micro fine shifting glitter to add that extra sparkle like the twinkling star in the night. swatches by makeupwithdrawal lacquerloon polishandpandas jackie18g

name: Madam Luck
description: Madam Luck is not your average gold flakes because it's filled with various shapes and sizes of holographic glitters. All the beautiful gold shimmer topper that is one of a kind that can be top over any polish. swatches by peachypolish lacquerloon madamluck

name: Bleu Tonic (limited edition)
description:
This remarkable ultra fine glitter combination with glass flakes appear clear in the bottle but once mixed or top over other color giving you a spectacular sparkling color shifting blue/green hues behind. What makes this polish special is the shifted glitter from blue to green then purple. It has almost a mystical quality as their color shift catches your eye and sparkles in the light that moves across them... you just can't quite see where all that magic is coming from. This polish is best use over black polish or blue and apply one to two thinly coats and top with a high quality topcoat. 


*Swatches by the lovely <span style="color:#ad2ef2"> lacquerloon on Instagram.

description:
Decorate your nails with these fashionable and easy to use red cherry bow tie rhinestones charms. You can also use them to decorate your home, cell phone's case, glasses, made card, scrap booking, body art, or any DIY projects. Easy to apply on natural or artificial nails.

Application:

Wear: reusable charm
Suitable to use on acrylic or gel nails
